works.title: ApoArm - Robot Arm with Tongyi Qianwen (Qwen) LLM Controller
works.description: A desktop robotic arm controlled by Tongyi Qianwen (Qwen) large language model with real-time digital twin visualization.
works.tech: Python, SolidWorks, STM32F103C8T6, MG996R Servo, Node.js, Vue.js, Serial Communication

works.title: Autonomous Item Handling Robot
works.description: An autonomous robot capable of navigating simple terrain, avoiding obstacles, and performing item handling tasks based on known maps with QR code-based sorting system.
works.tech: Jetson Orin NX, STM32F407, Mid-360 LiDAR, YOLOv5, OpenCV, FAST-LIO, Mecanum Wheels, Stepper Motors

works.title: Autonomous Fruit Picking Robot
works.description: An autonomous robot capable of navigating predefined maps and selectively harvesting ripe fruits while leaving unripe ones untouched using advanced computer vision and LiDAR-based navigation.
works.tech: Jetson Orin NX, STM32F407, Mid-360 LiDAR, YOLOv8, OpenCV, POINT-LIO, Mecanum Wheels, Stepper Motors, Laser Ranging
